import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' export default class Home extends Component { render () { return (

<>💻 Hello – I’m Karo.


I'm a software developer with a passion for audio technology

Ever since childhood I have been fascinated by computers, programming, and how they enrich our lives. My interest in technology and design has led me to the current process of completing an M.Sc. in Interactive Media Technology at KTH, focusing on sound interaction and design for all. I'm a software engineer working on audio and music software. My interests include physical modelling, interfaces, dsp, algorithmic composition and installations.

) } }
